languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты Паскаля вскидываются тревожным вихрем, с щелчком активируется рекордер его вокса.{/n} "Инициирую процедуру допроса".
{n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты Паскаля вскидываются тревожным вихрем, с щелчком активируется рекордер его вокса.{/n} "Инициирую процедуру допроса".

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡猛然抬起了机械触须，旋风般的动作中充满了警戒意味，音阵装置的录音器中传来了“咔哒”一声。{/n}“正在启动审讯程序。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡猛然抬起了机械触须，旋风般的动作中充满了警戒意味，音阵装置的录音器中传来了“咔哒”一声。{/n}“正在启动审讯程序。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal s'agitent avec inquiétude et l'enregistreur de son vox s'active en cliquetant.{/n} « Lancement de la procédure d'interrogatoire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal s'agitent avec inquiétude et l'enregistreur de son vox s'active en cliquetant.{/n} « Lancement de la procédure d'interrogatoire. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの機械触手が警戒するように逆立ち、彼のヴォクスの録音機がカチッと音を立てて作動した。{/n}「尋問手順を実施する」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの機械触手が警戒するように逆立ち、彼のヴォクスの録音機がカチッと音を立てて作動した。{/n}「尋問手順を実施する」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se levantan a modo de alarma y la grabadora de su voco se activa con un chasquido.{/n} «Iniciando protocolo de interrogación».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se levantan a modo de alarma y la grabadora de su voco se activa con un chasquido.{/n} «Iniciando protocolo de interrogación».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten fliegen alarmiert in die Luft, und der Rekorder in seinem Vox aktiviert sich mit einem Klicken.{/n} "Leite Verhörprozedur ein."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten fliegen alarmiert in die Luft, und der Rekorder in seinem Vox aktiviert sich mit einem Klicken.{/n} "Leite Verhörprozedur ein."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritleri, endişeyle dönmeye başlıyor. Voksundaki kayıt cihazı, tık sesi çıkararak etkinleşiyor.{/n} "Sorgulama prosedürü başlatılıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites snap up in a whirlwind of alarm, and the recorder in his vox activates with a click.{/n} "Initiating interrogation procedure."
